wordpressPage.title: Become a Contributor
wordpressPage.content:
Guest posting is one way of sharing your knowledge and to reach a big audience. It can help build your reputation and at the same time acquire links. This blog is open to accepting guest postings. You just need to follow a simple set of rules.

Guest Post Guidelines

  • Hold off on the self-promotional content. We would like to maintain a blog that is a source of usable and helpful information and insights.
  • Read and check for errors before submitting. As much as we might like the substance of your content, error-correcting is not something we may have time to do regularly.

What We Look For

  1. Content on these and similar topics: marketing, sales, B2B lead generation, tips on how to be productive, seo, social media
  2. Not less than 450 words
  3. Content NOT previously published somewhere else
  4. A substantial and interesting bio to go with your article
  5. NO affiliate links. We like to keep our blog spam-free.

How do you submit your guest post?

You can send a copy of your content to contributor@callboxnews.com. Kindly include an image (.jpeg) not more than 2MB. It normally takes us 2-3 days to check your content, so please be patient.

Once we have published your article, we will send you a confirmation email and a link to the said content. We strongly encourage that you share your published story to social sites like G+, Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn.

Let us share our knowledge together. We are looking forward to reading and publishing your content!
